${ModID}:TallForm.NAME: tall form
${ModID}:TallForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|@=ethereal. NL |>0=}whenever you play a card, apply !M! ${ModID}:encheesed to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: rummage
${ModID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage. NL shuffle !M! ${ModID}:junk into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Litterpicking.NAME: litterpicking
${ModID}:Litterpicking.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage. NL shuffle !M! ${ModID}:junk into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Scrabble.NAME: scrabble
${ModID}:Scrabble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:NimbleStrike.NAME: nimble strike
${ModID}:NimbleStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}deal !D! damage. NL discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile.

${ModID}:Dart.NAME: dart
${ModID}:Dart.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: apply !M! weak to them.

${ModID}:RashPounce.NAME: rash pounce
${ModID}:RashPounce.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL discard your hand.

${ModID}:RiskyManoeuvre.NAME: risky manoeuvre
${ModID}:RiskyManoeuvre.DESCRIPTION: {@@}deal !D! damage. NL shuffle !${ModID}:m2! *splinter{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Mine.NAME: mine!
${ModID}:Mine.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! block. NL add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand.

${ModID}:Scurry.NAME: scurry
${ModID}:Scurry.DESCRIPTION: {@@}gain !B! block. NL discard !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m3!: draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Ratflip.NAME: ratflip
${ModID}:Ratflip.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! block. NL apply !M! ${ModID}:encheesed and vulnerable.

${ModID}:RecyclingBin.NAME: recycling bin
${ModID}:RecyclingBin.DESCRIPTION: discard your hand. NL add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Careen.NAME: careen
${ModID}:Careen.DESCRIPTION: add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: play a *vault. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:Exude.NAME: exude
${ModID}:Exude.DESCRIPTION: {@@}apply double ${ModID}:encheesed the next !M! time{!M!|>1=s} you apply it.

${ModID}:TakeAWhiff.NAME: take a whiff
${ModID}:TakeAWhiff.DESCRIPTION: {@@}draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL gain [E] equal to the number of ${ModID}:junk in your hand. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:SurpriseShiv.NAME: surprise shiv
${ModID}:SurpriseShiv.DESCRIPTION: retain. NL deal !D! damage. NL increase this card's damage by !M! whenever you exhaust a card with this in hand. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:Ratpack.NAME: ratpack
${ModID}:Ratpack.DESCRIPTION: {@@}discard your hand. NL put !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Lazors.NAME: lazors!!
${ModID}:Lazors.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:SteppingStones.NAME: stepping stones
${ModID}:SteppingStones.DESCRIPTION: {@@}whenever you discard a card, ${ModID}:grime it{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:Piddle.NAME: piddle
${ModID}:Piddle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=innate. NL }${ModID}:grime and discard your draw pile. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:SqueezeThrough.NAME: squeeze through
${ModID}:SqueezeThrough.DESCRIPTION: {@@}add !${ModID}:m2! *splinter{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} into your hand. NL gain !B! block.

${ModID}:Empty.NAME: empty
${ModID}:Empty.DESCRIPTION: shuffle !M! ${ModID}:junk into your draw pile. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:Hoard.NAME: hoard
${ModID}:Hoard.DESCRIPTION: at the end of combat, choose 1 of !M! ${ModID}:junk to add to your deck.

${ModID}:HoleyBarrage.NAME: holey barrage
${ModID}:HoleyBarrage.DESCRIPTION: apply !M! ${ModID}:encheesed to all enemies. NL ${ModID}:encheesed does not wear off this turn.

${ModID}:Pilfer.NAME: pilfer
${ModID}:Pilfer.DESCRIPTION: apply !${ModID}:m2! weak. NL shuffle !M! ${ModID}:junk into your draw pile.

${ModID}:HereThereEverywhere.NAME: here, there, everywhere
${ModID}:HereThereEverywhere.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage twice. NL ${ModID}:nip: gain !M! block.

${ModID}:Sidestep.NAME: sidestep
${ModID}:Sidestep.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:hardy: gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}{!${ModID}:m2!|1= and draw !${ModID}:m2! card|>1= and draw !${ModID}:m2! cards}.

${ModID}:Encircle.NAME: encircle
${ModID}:Encircle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=${ModID}:hardy. NL }gain !B! block. NL increase this card's block by !M! whenever you play a card with this in hand. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:BinLidSwing.NAME: bin lid swing
${ModID}:BinLidSwing.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! block. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: all enemies lose !D! hp.

${ModID}:RecklessPrance.NAME: reckless prance
${ModID}:RecklessPrance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:tarnish your hand. NL discard !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID:m2}!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:BashAndDash.NAME: bash and dash
${ModID}:BashAndDash.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: gain block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:NotReadyYet.NAME: not ready yet!
${ModID}:NotReadyYet.DESCRIPTION: discard your hand. NL gain !B! block for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Cower.NAME: cower
${ModID}:Cower.DESCRIPTION: {@@}add a *safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} to your hand and ${ModID}:grime it x times.

${ModID}:Slog.NAME: slog
${ModID}:Slog.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage. NL the next time you finish a ${ModID}:wreckage this turn, the enemy loses !D! hp.

${ModID}:SandAttack.NAME: sand attack
${ModID}:SandAttack.DESCRIPTION: enemy loses !M! strength this turn. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: heal !M! hp. NL exhaust.

${ModID}:Fling.NAME: fling
${ModID}:Fling.DESCRIPTION: add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand. NL whenever you draw a card this turn, the enemy loses !${ModID}:m2! hp.

${ModID}:Scamper.NAME: scamper
${ModID}:Scamper.DESCRIPTION: {@@}deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m2!: gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:ZipAround.NAME: zip around
${ModID}:ZipAround.DESCRIPTION: deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:Overconfidence.NAME: overconfidence
${ModID}:Overconfidence.DESCRIPTION: if the enemy has over 50% hp, deal !D! damage. otherwise, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage.

${ModID}:TheStash.NAME: the stash
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: i shouldn't tap into my stash just yet!

${ModID}:SlipperyPaws.NAME: slippery paws
${ModID}:SlipperyPaws.DESCRIPTION: {@@}whenever you play a ${ModID}:grimy card, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:IllIntent.NAME: ill intent
${ModID}:IllIntent.DESCRIPTION: whenever you finish a ${ModID}:wreckage, gain !M! block. NL ${ModID}:wreck !${ModID}:m3!: channel !${ModID}:m2! lightning.

${ModID}:Recollect.NAME: recollect
${ModID}:Recollect.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=innate. NL }whenever you discard a card during your turn, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:LickEm.NAME: lick 'em
${ModID}:LickEm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=now and } at the start of your turn, ${ModID}:grime !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Scavenge.NAME: scavenge
${ModID}:Scavenge.DESCRIPTION: at the start of your turn, add !M! ${ModID}:junk to your hand.

${ModID}:TossPaper.NAME: toss paper
${ModID}:TossPaper.DESCRIPTION: whenever you exhaust a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:StinkyFumes.NAME: stinky fumes
${ModID}:StinkyFumes.DESCRIPTION: at the start of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:encheesed to all enemies.
